product_name: ALPS Mountaineering Eclipse Table - Special Buy
long_description: Thanks to its dual-level design, the ALPS Mountaineering Eclipse Table provides plenty of storage without taking up a lot of space-perfect for campground gatherings. Double-level table means there is room for food, drinks and games; bottom level features built-in cup holders. Buckles at corners offer quick setup and let table users adjust the tautness. Durable polyester and steel construction. Includes a shoulder carry bag. Special buy.
short_description: Thanks to its dual-level design, the ALPS Mountaineering Eclipse Table provides plenty of storage without taking up a lot of space-perfect for campground gatherings.
